means: 古雅别致，离奇有趣地，优雅地

sentence.Network_en: This may seem a quaintly old-fashioned idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 这似乎是一个古怪而落伍的想法。

sentence.Network_en: " I don't see what that's got to do with it,'said the drummer quaintly.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我看不出这和你的事有什么联系, " 杜洛埃说道,他感到莫名其妙.

sentence.Network_en: He is quaintly dressed , what a strange one he is.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一身的奇装异服, 真是另类!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(Q) ... quaint 奇怪的 quaintly 古雅别致 quaintness 离奇有趣.
趣致的英语翻译，趣致用英文怎么说 -... ... zing up 发音播放 quaintly 1. 离奇有趣地 gusto 兴致，热情，兴趣.
【转载】解读玖兰枢的26个字母_枢姬吧_百度贴吧 ... P——peaceful 和平的 Q——quaintly 优雅地 R——roust 唤醒.

list.abs: ...dress properly穿得恰当dress quaintly穿得离奇dress quietly穿得朴素.

entry.tran: 奇特的；古色古香的;古雅的
entry.def: Something that is quaint is attractive because it is unusual and rather old-fashioned.

example.ex: ...a small, quaint town with narrow streets and traditional half-timbered houses...
example.tran: 一座有着狭窄街道和传统的露木架房屋的古色古香的小镇

example.ex: That's how concepts like general welfare start to sound quaint in this age.
example.tran: 就这样，民众福利这一类概念在这个时代开始变得陈旧起来。

means.word_mean: 1. in a strange but not unpleasant manner;

sentences.sentence: "the old lady expressed herself somewhat quaintly"

auth_sentence.content: It reads quaintly now but was modernity itself then.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It reads quaintly now but was modernity itself then.

auth_sentence.content: Lush, life-affirming, prime time, quaintly charming, extremely big budget.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lush, life-affirming, prime time, quaintly charming, extremely big budget.

auth_sentence.content: But there's now a homegrown version of this trend: something homelier, smaller and quaintly British.
